704399f-a.text:
Flushing Avenue, at Harrison Avenue. The gas station occupies a triangular plot, bounded on the far side by Bartlett Street. On the latter are the chemical works of the Charles Pfizer Company.
P. L. Sperr  September 25, 1941
Neg. No. A-990
704399f-a.folder: Flushing Avenue & Harrison Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
